Directory: obj/sld/

.pro files

ominas_solid__define.pro

Class structure fo the SOLID class.

sld_albedo.pro

Returns the bond albedo for each given solid descriptor.

sld_assign.pro

Replaces fields in a SOLID object.

sld_create_descriptors.pro

Init method for the SOLID class.

sld_evolve.pro

Computes new solid descriptors at the given time offsets from the given solid descriptors using the taylor series expansion corresponding to the derivatives contained in the given solid descriptor.

sld_extn_fn.pro

Returns the name of the extinction function for each given solid descriptor.

sld_extn_parm.pro

Returns the extinction function parameters for each given solid descriptor.

sld_gm.pro

Returns the GM value for each given solid descriptor.

sld_mass.pro

Returns the mass for each given solid descriptor.

sld_npht.pro

Returns an integer indicating the maximum number of parameters allowed in the refl_parm and phase-parm fields of the solid descriptor.

sld_opacity.pro

Returns the opacity for each given solid descriptor.

sld_phase.pro

Computes a phase function.

sld_phase_fn.pro

Returns the name of the phase function for each given solid descriptor.

sld_phase_parm.pro

Returns the phase function parameters for each given solid descriptor.

sld_query.pro

Returns the fields associated with a CAMERA object.

sld_refl.pro

Computes a reflection function.

sld_refl_fn.pro

Returns the name of the reflection function for each given solid descriptor.

sld_refl_parm.pro

Returns the reflection function parameters for each given solid descriptor.

sld_set_albedo.pro

Replaces the bond albedo for each given solid descriptor.

sld_set_extn_fn.pro

Replaces the extinction function for each given solid descriptor.

sld_set_extn_parm.pro

Replaces the extinction function parameters for each given solid descriptor.

sld_set_gm.pro

Replaces the GM value for each given solid descriptor.

sld_set_mass.pro

Replaces the mass for each given solid descriptor.

sld_set_opacity.pro

Replaces the opacity of each given solid descriptor.

sld_set_phase_fn.pro

Replaces the phase function for each given solid descriptor.

sld_set_phase_parm.pro

Replaces the phase function parameters for each given solid descriptor.

sld_set_refl_fn.pro

Replaces the reflection function for each given solid descriptor.

sld_set_refl_parm.pro

Replaces the reflection function parameters for each given solid descriptor.
